creator: Edwin_STEELE@rta.nsw.gov.au
text:
One of the bonuses in ant1.6 is that I can finally throw away the pesky
cleartext telnet tasks. In migrating, I was badly caught out by the fact that
the telnet task has it's timeout in seconds whereas the sshexec task has it's
timeout in milliseconds.

RTFM? I did, but didn't pick up that the units had changed. Given
telnet->sshexec is prolly going to be a common upgrade path, it might be nice to
make special mention of the change of units for the timeout. It might save a few
developer hours and a few INVALID bug reports too :-)
